clauncher.name: Clauncher
entries: Remix Clauncher puffs up its claws and fans its tail in a serpentine display meant to mimic dragons. If intimidation fails, it unleashes high-heat bursts from its blaster claw, occasionally igniting its own shell in the process as it's shell has not fully developed to handle the intense heat.
clauncher.title: Decoy Shell

clawitzer.name: Clawitzer
entries: This variant of Clawitzer has evolved to mimic a threatening dragon's appearance to ward off larger predators. They can still manuever through water with ease.
Despite not being a Dragon-type, this crustacean has the firepower to back up its intimidating appearance! This firepower is useful for burning up prey too!
clawitzer.title: Inferno Shrimp

combee.name: Clawitzer
entries: This variant of Combee gives off a faint floral scent that lures curious Pokémon close—only to inflict them with an unsavory neurotoxin. Each face takes turns smiling.
The various heads of this Combee vary in their mood. Some seem to enjoy inflicting pain, while others are in distress watching their fellow Combee take pleasure in this pain.
combee.title: Toxic Drone

vespiquen.name: Vespiquen
entries: Remix Combee will supply Vespiquen with the proper diet to fuel her neurotoxin. If she is interrupted while feeding, she will lash out without mercy.
It brews its own potent neurotoxin within their body. When injected, this neurotoxin will cause intense infatuation, madness, and pain.
Vespiquen's remix form no longer needs to physically command her swarm—her pheromones alone are enough to keep her Combee in submission.
vespiquen.title: Malevolent Queen
